      • runOnThread

        @NotNull
public static <T,R> java.lang.Thread runOnThread(T $this$runOnThread,
                                                           @NotNull
                                                           kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super R,kotlin.Unit> onResult,
                                                           @NotNull
                                                           kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Throwable,kotlin.Unit> onError,
                                                           boolean _isDaemon,
                                                           @NotNull
                                                           kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super T,? extends R> lambda)

        Calls the specified function lambda with this value as its receiver and returns its result as callback each call is made on a new thread

        Parameters:
        onResult - the code that return the result,if this code is missing will be run stub
        onError - the code that handle the Exception,if this code is missing will be run stubErrorCallbackonError and onResult are called in the main thread
        _isDaemon - determines whether the thread is a daemon, false by default
        Returns:
        a reference to the thread in which the work is performed can be used for example for interrupting
        See Also:
        lambda
